name: xp-emitter
description: This class is used to provide event emitting functionalities.
author: ExpandJS <dev@expandjs.com> (http://expandjs.com)

scripts.browserify-min: browserify -d index -i expandjs -p [minifyify --map xp-emitter.min.map --output dist/xp-emitter.min.map] > dist/xp-emitter.min.js
